sections.title: Brother of the Seal (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Brother of the Seal class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Brother of the Seal gains no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Unarmed Combat ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Brother of the Seal class levels stack with monk levels for flurry of blows, stunning fist, and unarmed strike damage calculations.

sections.title: Water Splitting Stone ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: When attacking objects, the Brother of the Seal ignores 1 point of hardness per class level.

sections.title: Gatekeeper (Sp) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Brother of the Seal can cast either hold portal or arcane lock a limited number of times per day, with uses increasing at higher levels.

sections.title: Trapfinding ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Adds half class level to Perception and Disable Device checks for traps, and can disarm magical traps with Disable Device.

sections.title: Runefinding ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Gains full class level bonus on trapfinding checks against magical writings and automatically notices trapped magical writings.

sections.title: Awesome Blow ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Gains Awesome Blow feat as bonus feat with Wisdom modifier added to combat maneuver checks and deals unarmed strike damage, with ki point or stunning fist expenditure to affect larger creatures.

sections.title: Unsealing (Su) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Can touch magical wards and protections to attempt dispelling them by expending a stunning fist use, functioning as dispel magic.

sections.title: Domino Strike ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: When awesome blow knocks a target into an obstacle, adds class level to the 1d6 damage dealt to both target and obstacle.

sections.title: Hands of Stone (Su) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Increases unarmed strike damage as if the Brother of the Seal were one size category larger.

sections.title: Rapid Slam ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Can use Awesome Blow once per round as part of flurry of blows, charge, or with other combat feats as a standard action.

sections.title: Cascading Strike ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: When awesome blow knocks a target into another creature, can attempt additional awesome blow maneuvers in a straight line with cumulative penalties.

sections.title: Unraveling (Su) (Brother of the Seal)
sections.description: Unsealing ability can now destroy force effects and stationary magical barriers that normally cannot be dispelled.
